channel.title: Planet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the planet of the day.

item.title: TOI-1846 b
item.description: TOI-1846 b is a confirmed exoplanet discovered using NASA's Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite (TESS). It orbits a star in the constellation of Aries and is one of the numerous small exoplanets that populate the "radius valley," a gap in the size distribution of exoplanets that separates rocky super-Earths from gaseous sub-Neptunes. TOI-1846 b is particularly important for ongoing studies of planetary formation and evolution.
